featured_reviews.review_id: Absolutely ridiculous behaviour from the staff. It's 9:20pm. I ordered online ahead of time as I was coming in car from home to eat in. Had to go to washroom first as I have some health issues and needed to wash my hands before I eat. As normally ppl should. Staff didn't want to let me in with an excuse that the maintenance is in progress. No one was doing maintenance they just simply decided to close to the washroom for the night. This kind of behaviour should be illegal as it is a restaurant and restaurant bylaw says clearly you need to provide washroom when ppl eat in. Hope they will not behave like this towards anyone else in the future. Managers name that night was Jenny. Hope the top management will sort this out. I will visit again to see if the behaviour towards customers improved. Then will revisit my review.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Expensive location -- 30c to $1 more expensive for most items.  Go to the Kingsway/Victoria location if you can, it's a bit cheaper.

On top of being one of the most expensive locations in the city this one's also one of the worst.  They clear off all orders from their pick up screen making for a confused, full lobby of everyone asking if their order is up.  Use the system as it's meant to be and things would be a lot clearer and run more smoothly!

Somehow, this location also has the worst McIced coffee ever.

featured_reviews.review_id:
There's typically enough parking available. The upstairs seating area offers plenty of space, making it a great spot for families or groups. The food quality consistently meets my expectations, and the service is reliable. The availability of kiosks is a convenient touch, especially during busy hours.

However, there are some downsides to consider. The downstairs seating area is quite limited, which can be a drawback during crowded periods. It's also worth noting that the upstairs area may close at night, limiting your options for seating. Lastly, be prepared for potential wait times, as occasionally, there can be delays in receiving your order.

In summary, this McDonald's location is a dependable choice with a few minor inconveniences. If you value parking availability, good food, and a variety of seating options, it's worth a visit, just be mindful of potential wait times and seating restrictions.

featured_reviews.review_id: Horrible service here. I ordered 20 nuggets, 3 honey sauce, spicy habanero sauce, quarter pounder with NO onions and EXTRA pickles, and a medium root beer. First of all my friends and I have to wait nearly 40 minutes for our order and when I kept asking them whether or not they're making it the staff kept saying they were working on it but we wouldn't get our food. Then I find out that they gave SOMEONE ELSE our order without double checking the other person's receipt on whether or not it was the correct order. Then after asking them 5 times to make ours they only give us 17 nuggets, 2 honey sauce, spicy habanero sauce, and did not take out the onions from the burger. Also did not receive our root beer and the staff would just ignore us when we would ask politely. My friend is deathly allergic to onions too so she wasn't able to have her burger. I understand it was crowded but that is no way to go about our order. Horrible customer service and I'm very disappointed by this location. They also refused us a refund for not giving us our full order. Terrible place and I will never come back here.

We are working on a jobsite nearby, occasionally stop for coffee or breakfast in the morning, not once has my order been correct.

This morning I ordered a sausage and egg mcgridle, they gave me two of the mcgriddle buns with a jr chicken patty inside.

The employees running the drive thru window are consistently snarky, with the main focus of getting you in and out of the drive-thru as fast as possible, regardless if your order is right.

When I did bring up an issue with the order the one morning, I was told it's my fault she couldn't hear me clear enough, and to speak up next time.

One of the worst McDonald's locations in the metro Vancouver area, and the owner does not care due to the influx of knight street traffic and airport location.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Slow clap for this location

Food is typical for McDonald's.

Service, we'll this location is horrible, everytime I come here I get told to park and wait for my order. A fry burger and a pop. How sad it is that they cannot have enough food ready to go. I understand that demand is higher at certain times but 25 minutes from order to getting food is ridiculous. And when you refuse to be parked you get even worse service because now you are going against the normal, it's a drive thru and I should have to pull over and wait. While I sat and waited for my order 6 to 7 vehicles were parked so they can make their time for drive thru.  Truly terrible management for thinking this is acceptable to treat customers like this.

After receiving my order my fry level is laughable. Ordered junior McChicken extra mayo and received my mcchicken with no mayo

How do you mess that up.
Completely unacceptable.

Corporate McDonald's needs to review this location and it's management for customer service and drive thru operations.

featured_reviews.review_id: This has to be the worst McDonald's I've been to. This is not a one-time deal; they're the nearest McDonald's and as a busy student on a budget I end up here once in a while. No matter what time of day, even if they aren't busy, you'll end up getting parked to wait for your food when going through drive thru, even for a small, basic order, and sometimes end up sitting for upwards of 10 minutes. "Fast food", woo! There's never any greeting at the drive thru mic, you drive up and sit there waiting for several minutes without so much as a "hello" or "be right with you". Today, I received two "sausage" egg McMuffins with no sausage on either. Great... to summarize: terrible, slow, inaccurate, impolite and no end in sight. Not to mention their nightmare of a parking lot.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Grabbed a game day Big Mac deal here. It was freshly made and for $3, a great deal!

I have been to this McDonald's for decades, going back to its original location on Hastings and Alpha. This "newer" location is smaller, but has a more modern atmosphere.

Staff are courteous, efficient, and patient. Drive thru and in-restaurant ordering experiences were always positive.

Parking is plenty, but due to the elongated space, you're a little further away a lot of times.

Food-wise, due to traffic volume, is more often fresh than not. Besides the Still Creek location, I find this location one of the more reliable McDonald's for consistent fresh quality food.

Great spot to pop in if you're hungry for McDonald's!

I don't mind waiting here, I said nicely. I rolled up my window and sat there on my phone. They had a long line in drive through. My burgers came within 30 seconds. Lol I hate it I dunno y they make me wait most times for a normal order. I'm not ordering the pizza or anything out of the ordinary. So loophole just hold the line up. LOL THEY HAVE TO PRIORITIZE YOU AND GET THE LINE MOVING. And as I was taught. The customer service. It's a virus. If ONE person has bad service it can spread, possibly this someone who has been there a long time with seniority? I do believe it can trickle down. Well if he's being lazy then I'm being lazy. Monkey c monkey do.

featured_reviews.review_id: I tried to visit this location for breakfast on July 31st 2023. I was in the line  to order before 11am and was placing my order by 11:02am. Despite being in line before the breakfast cutoff and only being 2 minutes passed 11am I was told the breakfast menu was no longer available. Kinda frustrating as I'm sure they could rather easily accommodated my order but instead choice to turn me away. This is the first time I've been to a McDonald's location in a while and now I remember why.

featured_reviews.review_id: The service at this McDonald's has decreased exponentially. The late night staff seems to always have some sort of argument as to why they can't serve me the food I ordered. Today I ordered something as simple as a large ice water and the guy told me that I was unable to order that I told him I was willing to pay for it and he said sorry I don't want to do it. This makes no sense to me I've never been to a restaurant where you're willing to pay for a product and they say no to you especially if it's just WATER. Especially when you're spending 30 to $40 each time just for two people you would expect better service. I hope management gets involved in actually makes a difference and teaches these people customer service it seems that customer service has gone down the drain. The employees act annoyed to serve you. It's super sad. I miss the good old days of good customer service. Not a Karen just want basic customer service.

featured_reviews.review_id:
During my recent visit to McDonald's in Vancouver, I had a mixed experience encompassing both positive and negative aspects. Here's a balanced review highlighting the key points:

Positive:
Menu Variety - McDonald's offers a diverse menu with plenty of options. Whether it was classic favourites or new additions, there were choices to suit different preferences and dietary restrictions.

Negative:
Slow Service - This particular McDonald's service could have been faster. It took longer than expected to place my order and receive my food. Improved efficiency during peak hours would enhance the overall dining experience.

Negative:
Atmosphere Concerns - The atmosphere of the restaurant fell short of expectations. The seating area appeared unclean, and the floors were scattered with food and drink spills. This lack of cleanliness created an unhealthy and uninviting environment.

Positive:
Familiarity and Convenience - McDonald's consistency in its menu and service can be comforting for customers seeking a familiar dining experience. Additionally, its convenient locations make it easily accessible for a quick meal.

In conclusion, my visit to McDonald's in Vancouver had ups and downs. While the menu variety and familiarity were positive, the slow service and cleanliness issues detracted from the overall experience. I hope the management takes note of these concerns and takes steps to improve service efficiency and maintain a cleaner and more inviting environment for customers.

featured_reviews.review_id: This place is always HORRIBLY busy.  I chose to walk in but I regret, there were about 30 people starring at the order monitor but there were no order number at all.  After close to 40 minutes waiting for my 2 meals with 2 fries no salt, end up I got salt all over my hand and the food I got was cold.  Asked to change the hot fries with no salt and complained I had been waiting for my food over 30 mins.  The manager gave an attitude, "it is not my problem, we were busy", I said "so is that my problem? you are the manager on duty and not responsible the human power?"  She turned around and shout "it's not my problem, give her something hot".  I am patience enough to wait more than 30 mins for FAST FOOD and I deserve to receive this kind of "Customer service"????  The manager was trying to hide when I was taking her picture for evidence.  And other manager on duty was trying to cover her and asked me am I using human right.  There is nothing to do with human right but I was not treated right.  I brought it up to McDonald Headquarter about the incident I experienced at this location and asked for refund coz I threw them away.  The headquarter told me this restaurant manager would contact me within 10 business days but I never receive any phone call or email.  I received 2 meal coupons from Headquarter as a refund.  I will never ever come back again.  P.S. This restaurant is always full of garbage everywhere and no one was doing cleaning.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I worked here after high school during the 1980's for six years until Expo 86. Ah, the memories. Now I eat here and it's a totally different environment. The restaurant is smaller and the service isn't what it use to be. I had to wait 5 minutes before a crew noticed me standing at the counter. They have to look up often, not at their food station.
The drink station needs a wipe and the floors are sticky. The tables needs clearing and wiped. And floors swept of dropped fries. My whole time eating there not a single time a lot & lobby person checked.
I'll still come back at another time to eat to check if there's any improvements.

The floor was very dirty with food wrappers, napkins, and cups on the floor all over the place. This was also a surprise, but not nice.

The staff was slow and the service was minimal.

I'm deeply disappointed by my recent visit to McDonald's, the first-ever in Canada, located at Landsdowne, Richmond. Despite being a loyal customer for years and always ordering two sandwiches with extra butter portions - a practice consistent with requesting ketchup - I was shockingly refused by an employee named Waqas (if I recall the name correctly). He claimed extra butter is only for breakfast hours, despite the fact that it's a standard option on the kiosk, similar to the availability of complimentary ketchup.

Waqas's dismissive and confrontational attitude was disrespectful. He even argued I hadn't paid separately for the butter, using this as a reason to deny it. This experience was disheartening and marred my overall visit.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Obviously McDonald's isn't known for being lavished, amazing 5 star food. I've ordered chicken nuggets from there twice now and both times they've come so stale and gross I can't even eat them. This last time I got their food there was also MOLD on my fries! Unacceptable, no matter what restaurant you're running.

On top of that, they also state they are open 24 hours, yet they shut their indoor dining down at 6pm most days and only allow mobile ordering which is extremely frustrating if someone wants to use cash or for elderly people who are not as experienced in technology but would still like something to eat.

Overall, no matter how desperate you get, go elsewhere. You won't regret not spending your money here.

featured_reviews.review_id: This morning around 7 AM I ordered MacDonald's breakfast through doordash.  I got my regular order which is a two breakfast burrito meal with coffee, a sausage McMuffin, and I decided to add a smoothie.  I got my order, opened the bag and right away there was no smoothie.  I take out the food and proceed to open up my burritos to add salsa inside.  Right away I noticed that the wrap seems soggy, I open it and the eggs and meat inside look wet.  I take a bite and it tastes fine.  Then I take my first sip of coffee and that tastes off.  I'm hungry so I eat my food.....  Then in around a half hour I start to feel light headed and sick to my stomach.  Then 15-20 minutes later I find myself puking and sitting on the toilet for a while.  It's now 8 hours later and my stomach has still been a mess.  No idea what happened, I've had this same breakfast so many times and it's never done this to me, so I guess I'm posting this to say if it looks or tastes off don't eat the food.

featured_reviews.review_id:
McDonald's has always been a go-to spot for me when I'm craving some good comfort food. The taste and quality of their food consistently great.The atmosphere is pretty chill, whether I'm grabbing a quick bite or hanging out with friends. It's got that classic McDonald's vibe that's both nostalgic.

Now, when it comes to service, it's a bit of slow. Sometimes things run smoothly and the staff is friendly, but there have been a few instances where I've encountered slow service or slight mistakes in my order. That's why I'm giving it a 3-star rating for service.

McDonald's still gets a thumbs up from me. The food and vibe are top-notch, and even with some service hiccups, it's a spot I'll keep coming back to this address

featured_reviews.review_id:
Head offices & Regional Managers
*PAY Attention*

Had to reduce the stars  I frequent this location multiple times a week to check the conditions of this location.

I've worked in this industry for decades and I manage properties. I'm also a safety, and food safety and security inspections officer for multi billion dollar corporations.

Unfortunately, I know when a venue isn't managed properly.

This location is busy, MacDonalds app keeps sending offers to Walmart McDonald's creating congestion and traffic.

This location is frequently understaffed, with a high turnover rate. Resulting in poor quality service, uncleanliness, long wait times, and disgusting, dirty places with flies buzzing everywhere.

The self-serve soda machine and ketchup  dispenser is frequently neglected resulting in a mess, or emptied, or lack of ice. This further causes more congestion as patrons now have to come up to the countertops to request for ketchup, lids , ice or soda.

This location's managers and supervisors need to be on top of this every hour on the hour.

The tables need to be cleaned, especially during rush hours.

Any MacDonald that has flies buzzing around is a result of staff NOT cleaning properly for weeks on end!

Another serious issue is the quality of the oil
*See picture*

The oil is overly burnt and brown or black, it taste that way also and anything coming out of the deep fryer taste disgusting.
I'm fully aware of what is required to clean the oil fryer and how often the oil needs to be changed.

I can tell you this has not been done properly, the oil is over used.  I can tell without even having to visit the kitchen to take a look at the fryer.

Fix these issues before I report this location to authorities.

The self-serve soda machine and ketchup  dispenser is frequently neglected resulting in a mess, or emptied, or lack of ice. This further causes more congestion as patrons now have to come up to the countertops to request for ketchup, lids , ice or soda.

This location's managers and supervisors need to be on top of this every hour on the hour.

The tables need to be cleaned, especially during rush hours.

Any MacDonald that has flies buzzing around is a result of staff NOT cleaning properly for weeks on end!

Another serious issue is the quality of the oil
*See picture*

The oil is overly burnt and brown or black, it taste that way also and anything coming out of the deep fryer taste disgusting.
I'm fully aware of what is required to clean the oil fryer and how often the oil needs to be changed.

I can tell you this has not been done properly, the oil is over used.  I can tell without even having to visit the kitchen to take a look at the fryer.

Fix these issues before I report this location to authorities.

It's McDonald's. For when you don't have time to get out of the car and you're okay on spending money on food that is utterly predictable and forgettable, it's one of your only options in this world. Sometimes as a bonus, it will trigger a childhood memory, good or bad.

Anyway, it hasn't killed me yet, so that's something.

This particular McDonald's is not a drive thru, so there's almost no reason to go to it.

And the washrooms are out of order most of the time.

I wanted to take a moment to share my heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional customer service I recently received at your McDonald's establishment, all thanks to the outstanding efforts of your employee, David.

During my recent visit to your restaurant, I was pleasantly surprised by the level of service that David provided. From the moment I walked in, his welcoming greeting set a positive tone for my dining experience. Throughout my visit, David's attentiveness, courtesy, and professionalism were consistently on display, making my time at McDonald's truly enjoyable.

In an industry where exceptional customer service can make a significant difference, David's dedication to going above and beyond stood out. His polite and accommodating demeanor exemplified the kind of service that keeps customers coming back.

I believe that employees like David are a valuable asset to your team, and they contribute significantly to the positive image of your establishment. Please extend my sincere thanks to him for his outstanding service and for making my visit memorable.

I look forward to returning to your McDonald's location in the future, knowing that I can expect the same level of excellence in customer service.

Thank you for maintaining such high standards and for having exceptional employees like David.

I just realized when I was handed the drink that my wife and kids dont like ice on the drink.
I asked the server to change my drink coz of the ice with a sorry and thank you. I was just so disgusted by the act of that server when she took the drink and started taking the ice out of the drink using the lids she pulled off the drinks. I think these new immigrants need to be educated about cleanliness and hygiene which is very important coz I noticed a lot of very unwanted and inhygiene  practice at fast food chains with these new immigrants working everywhere. I reach out to Mc Donalds to please look into this matter and keep our culture of cleanliness as it used to be when it comes to food

featured_reviews.review_id:
SEE PICTURE. Seen this at landsdowne alderbridge way location, please no2 mcdonalds get this in your bathrooms so we can use are foot to open door! No one wants to touch the handle after washing your hands it is not sanitary and no napkings are still not provided at Mcdonalds no 2 . LEAVE A LIKE IF YOU AGREE. This NO 2 Mcdonalds makes the absolute worst fries of any mcdonalds ive been to, always undercooked or overcoooked, never fresh taste stale, clearly the staff cooks alot of fries at once and does not throw out after the designated time and also is not cooking the correct time consistently i constantly get like 10 of the fries extremely soft undercooked or a few black burnt. Also they short you on fries . Large fries always is never full to top aswell as medium!  The Oreo mcfleury never has enough icecream,  oreo or amount of extras, burgers are usually cooked well but sometimes after 6pm or night especially quarter pounder, cheeseburgers etc it is undercooked or has no taste.  Breakfast they do well, hashbrowns always fresh however ive notice sausage and egg bread is sometimes burned black or hard maybe adjust the toaster?? The coffee never taste really good i usually get 2 cream one sugar and it taste like nothing. The bathroom is a horrible, extremely heavy door with no automatic button!  literally everyone is touching the same handle to get in and out, disgusting!!  a foot handle would make the difference and is much needed or replace the door you make enough money common guys, or automated door... or at the very least leave paper towel so staff and visitors can at least grab door with handle and throw in a nearby garbage like every other store!!!  so not every is touching the same thing, disgusting to think staff touch that then go make your food and visitors touch that when leaving bathroom and go eat there food. Serious  health concern! Or if all that is too expensive leave the door open during shifts with a piece of wood or something under it.  Also Only one toilet  in such a huge restaurant bathroom?? Needs a major renovation. Been like this for atlest 10 years. On a positive note staff are friendly and do work fast. Hope they put some papertowel in bathroom to grab when leaving the bathroom soon, or leave mens door open so you dont have to touch that handle and open that heavy door! Or make it automatic like the main entrance door which is very nice. ALSO been told at drivethrough the park on side and no one was even waiting behind me?? Had 2 items. Why have drive through if u make us wait? Seen others make this point to. Hope this review makes a difference. Leave a like if you agree with my points.

SUMMARY
Pls improve! Manager owner. We understand that new people are hired everyday but other Mcdonalds do not have this problem, have them trained properly.

COOK FRIES PROPERLY WITH PROPER AMOUNT OF FRIES GIVEN CONSISTENLY WITH SALT! cook burgers so they are well done lil burn on em not under cooked with proper seasoning. Dont burn buns on breakfast sausage and egg.

FIX BATHROOM PLS, offer paper towels to use to exit after washing hands and put garbage near to throw away, not just hand drier as everyone touches same handle and alot of people do not wash there hands!  or leave door open permanently with a wood stopper, or add automatic sensor to open door or replace door. Add another toilet, one toilet for a 60 seating restaurant is not enough. Renovate bathroom.

Do not tell drivers to park on side when it is not busy. We go to drivethroughs cuz we are in a hurry. Add more staff to night shift food is always cold and not fresh especially fries and wait times are up to 40 min. HIRE MORE STAFF FOR NIGHT SHIFT.

Oreo mcfleury fill to top with ice cream and use more oreo or smarties etc not giving enough quantity .

Improve coffee. Make sure to put what we order. 2 creams and 1 sugar, shouldnt taste like no sugar or no cream.

Thanks for listening and hope to see improvements in the coming week! Thank you staff and managers!

I wanted to have a quick late night snack last night. Order simplely two item double fliet with no tartar sauce. And sausage egg Mcmiffin. Simple right? Guess it is too difficult for No2 McDonald.

On my bill (shows on the picture), clear says double filet and been charge for it. This happens many time already. Would the staff recheck the order before put in the bag?

On the other item, I clearly says Sausage egg, even the staff took the order repeat back as Sausage egg. But then yet still put in the wrong order with no egg. Oh well, a least I didn't get charge for it. But the muffin is dry and old and burn like the picture show.

Two simple item. Two mistake and trash and burn food quality. Come on No2 McDonald. I see many one star on your review mainly complain about food quality. And yet the management never reply or common any one of them and never show any improvement. And come on, staff, if you are not capable to check if the right order is been order and put in the bag, and keep up the food quailty in the fast food restaurant, I don't know what other job you can do.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Arguably one of the better operated McDonald's! Foods come out hot, quick turnover that means, and well trained staffs!
It's our go to in the morning before church on Sunday and course kids love happy meals.

However franchise should focus on fair pricing as a fast food rather than returning capital to investors, and growing margin profile YoY.  Once it becomes higher price than a regular food, it won't last.

Chicken Mcmuffin was an interesting one! Mcflurry is so addictive.

Hah! Guess you have the rights to enforce those prices.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I am unsure of the purpose of the monitor if I cannot find my order and have to rely on the staff for updates every time. Despite their assurances that it is on its way, I believe that if an order is not ready, it should be displayed on the monitor.

It seems that the orders are removed from the monitor to showcase how quickly they serve customers. However, in reality, there is often a backlog of orders waiting to be fulfilled behind the counter. This raises concerns about the integrity of McDonald's practices.

I am curious whether anyone from McDonald's reads customer reviews and takes them into consideration.

From attached picture, you can see people waiting for their orders while there are only two order on the monitor.

featured_reviews.review_id:
**Update** To everyone who has had a negative experience with this location, please fill out a contact form on the McDonald's app or website and file a complaint. They told me this location is already flagged and on their radar. I took the chance and ordered two breakfast sandwiches today and one of them was wrong, and the other had ZERO sauce. The chicken tasted old. Absolutely disgusting.

Third review since this McDonald's keeps deleting them since they don't like hearing the truth!!

In short:

Always check your order before you leave because they usually mess it up and forget something or give you the wrong item.

The food quality is horrendous and does not meet the franchise standards. You might receive a burger with barely any sauce, bread will be burnt, fries are half full and upside down in the bag, etc.

The facility is usually dirty.

Staff are cranky and never know what they are doing.

I've sent in complaints to McDonald's via Twitter and email and they have responded and told me they will be following up with this location.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I get that McDonald's is fast food. But on about 3 occasions my egg mc muffins have been unedibles. To the point that when I gave it to a coworker they threw it straight in the garbage.

The grease was so bad it was seeping through the wrapper all over the place. I've been to many McDonald's and never seen it this bad on numerous occasions.

Plus coffee is never consistent.

Really hate giving bad reviews but do yourself a favour and get something edible elsewhere.

Staff are nice tho.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Been giving this place quite a few chances but their service is the worst compared to other McDonald's locations I've been at. I understand that they're a fast food chain but it doesn't excuse the fact that their workers seem so unhappy at dealing with their customers.
Multiple times they've missed my orders (e.g. no fries when I ordered a meal with medium fries) and I mostly order takeout so I can't just easily inform them of the missing items. I know I should double check my orders before I leave but there are times when I forget and as a customer we do rely and expect on the servers to give you your correct and complete order.

Lastly, they will close and no longer accept orders 10minutes before closing. I've worked at a fast food place as a teenager and we were required to keep our store open to customers at the last minute. The employee on the counter had to raise her voice to tell us that they will no longer be accepting food orders and that we should leave.

featured_reviews.review_id: Mindy the manager was extremely rude to me when I asked her to unlock the bathroom downstairs. She said go upstairs I said no my mom needs to use the bathroom downstairs. She ignored me. I had to tell her again and I said my mom is handicap she can't go up the stairs she needs the bathroom. She looked at me like "who cares" and her other staff ignored me again. I had to basically tell them to open the door and  when I told Mindy she was rude she started arguing with me and talking to me as if we were in a brawl. Completely unprofessional for a "manager" to act this way! She argued with me and even customers were shaking their head at what she was doing. When someone needs to use the bathroom it should not matter what the reason is. I did not need to explain to her that my mother is handicap and is unable to go up the stairs. I have never been to this location but I do have to say it's one of the worst experiences I have ever had. Mindy needs management skills training. Horrible experience! The best part is when you complain to their upper management they always say "will look into it" and nothing gets fixed or done. Upper management will read this and do absolutely nothing and continue on because that's what McDonald's management do "nothing".

featured_reviews.review_id:
I don't usually review a fast food restaurant, but after "Multiple" similar incidents, I have to write it to warn people about this place.  When you order drive in, make sure that you check the order especially if you order more than 2 items, because today marked the fourth time that this chain "FORGOT" to put one of the order and mask it in the pile of other orders in one bag.

My order today: McCrispy Bacon Deluxe meal, 20 McNuggets and Fillet of Fish burger.
They deliberately packed all of the food in one bag and lo and behold when I opened it at home, they "FORGOT" to put the fillet of fish burger.

If this only happens once, I wouldn't think about but this is now my fourth time, losing an order, the items they "FORGOT" in the past, "6 Mcnuggets 2x, another Fish of Fillet"  It seems to me that this becomes a habit whenever the person who did the order is this lady by the name of YASHPREET.  So be careful, when you order more than 2 items, ask for receipts, stay in the parking lot, check your orders then leave, don't let YASHPREET eat your meal because she "FORGOT" to put your small order of burger in your bag.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Came over on the Seabus and wanted something quick for food before going on a hike so decided on McDonald's. The service was quick which was good and the food was the typical McDonald's that you expect. Did enjoy that could see the ocean although wish that they had a patio area cause it looked like they could but it was closed.

Would go back!

featured_reviews.review_id:
I want to give them zero star.
The manager is not responsibility.
I had 15 min to take the ferry. So I ordered 1 drink 1 chiken wrap. But didnt get anything for 11 min. So I asked them how long does it take, and then they said they can't make it what I ordered.
At that time I had only 2 min to take the ferry.
They offered 2 small wraps instead of a big wrap. But they didnt make it in 2 min, I asked for the refund right away. But the manager was soooo slow, didnt try to help me, repeating excuses and so rude!!!!
Eventually, I missed the ferry and had to waste 30 min:) thank you guys!

Asked to change the ice cream then left the location. When sat down to eat in the near park realized the burgers were without Mayo as asked but no Habenaro. What I waste of my time and money. Very disappointed with service and food.

featured_reviews.review_id: We ordered one large kiwi pineapple banana smoothie and one medium kiwi pineapple banana smoothie, one large fries and a chocolate sundae. End up the fries is in small to medium amount which only filled half of the fries box! Further The two smoothies that we received were in the same size, the large smoothie was still have more than one centimetre before hitting the cup line near the top. When my son talked to the staff asking him to top up the large cup, he grabbed the two smoothies (one large and one medium size), and pour the smoothie out from the medium cup to the large cup to top up the large smoothie! What kind of attitude is that? We are not beggar who ask for free food but have paid full price for what we are entitled to receive from the merchant! When the staff passed the "adjusted" smoothies back to us, the female staff who was standing next to the Asian young staff who was dealing with our request looked surprised by what the Asian staff had done to the cups. This is a terrible customer service experience that we ever experienced at McDonald's. We will never come here again unless the team manager look into this and take appropriate action to a better training to their team! They need to know what is the proper amount of each food items and know what is a proper and respectful way to deal with their customers!

featured_reviews.review_id:
entrance is in the front walkway and also in the back parking lot. the back parking lot is dangerous a bit since the drive through cars will be crossing the entrance pathway. there is no way to slow cars from crossing in front of you.

this place is a bit clean and has more space since not a lot of people come. staff kind of showed their frustration a little bit in the front so yeah it kinda of affected the mood of the place.

there is outdoor seating but it's very tight. I'm pregnant so it's not too ideal to weave around the picnic tables even though it was good sun outside.

bought mcflurry kitkat but it wasn't mixed properly at all. it wasn't mixed halfway to the bottom. so that one was sad. and it had a big hole in the middle so i was basically getting half of what i paid for

bought fries as well, nothing new. greasy but that's what fries are unfortunately.

good for a stop over place before heading out to walk at the seawall for sure.
